name: Life CYOA
description:
Please know that this is very much in early development and that uploading it is for it to be out there.

This game is meant to be something for myself to make random and dumb stories that I thought others might enjoy seeing. I have a dumb sense of humor that can seen throughout the stories, so I hope you enjoy! If you have any questions or comments about it, feel free to email me at projectcyoa@gmail.com

Anyways, what is this? Life is a start to something, beginning as a seed, and becoming much larger than that, whether it be a spud golem, or a Christmas tree. I wanted to make a disconnected story that is still interesting to go throughout and find new secrets within them, which in some way makes them interconnected.  I'm going to stop myself here, or else I might end up spoiling how the whole story works. Anyways, I'll stop myself here and give a shameful plug to my youtube development channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCARpjBkg__vuXMixb1L-JTg?
